metadata.title: CVE-2013-6889 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU Rush 1.7 does not properly drop privileges, which allows local users toread arbitrary files via the --lint option.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6889` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rush - 1.7+dfsg-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rush package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7+dfsg-4').
